title: Limitless Potential Of Cannabis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Dr. Ethan Russo and Dale Hunt, PhD - superstars in the cannabis space - join Rena Sherbill to discuss why the cannabis plant is a biochemical treasure trove that we've only just begun to understand. We cover endocannabinoids, body receptors, the entourage effect on a molecular level, and why we're at the frontier of the future of medicine. We also discuss them teaming up to create Breeder's Best, and why it's essential for breeders to have a seat at the table. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
